history.proof: intros p. induction p using pbtree_rect. - left. exists a. reflexivity. - right. intros a H. discriminate. - right. intros a H. discriminate. - right. intros a H. discriminate.

chat.content:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall p : pbtree, (exists a : A, p = pbleaf a) \/ (forall a : A, p <> pbleaf a)

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
pbtree_rect : forall P : pbtree -> Type, (forall a : A, P (pbleaf a)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> P (pbleft p)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> P (pbright p)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> forall p0 : pbtree, P p0 -> P (pbnode p p0)) -> forall p : pbtree, P p
pbtree_ind : forall P : pbtree -> Prop, (forall a : A, P (pbleaf a)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> P (pbleft p)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> P (pbright p)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> forall p0 : pbtree, P p0 -> P (pbnode p p0)) -> forall p : pbtree, P p
pbtree_rec : forall P : pbtree -> Set, (forall a : A, P (pbleaf a)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> P (pbleft p)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> P (pbright p)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> forall p0 : pbtree, P p0 -> P (pbnode p p0)) -> forall p : pbtree, P p
pbtree_sind : forall P : pbtree -> SProp, (forall a : A, P (pbleaf a)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> P (pbleft p)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> P (pbright p)) -> (forall p : pbtree, P p -> forall p0 : pbtree, P p0 -> P (pbnode p p0)) -> forall p : pbtree, P p
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
not_in_find_code : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * list bool)), (forall p : list bool, ~ In (a, p) l) -> find_code eqA_dec a l = nil
frequency_list_perm : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A), permutation l (flat_map (fun p : A * nat => id_list (fst p) (snd p)) (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
Eqdep_dec.K_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, x = y \/ x <> y) -> forall (x : A) (P : x = x -> Prop), P eq_refl -> forall p : x = x, P p
add_frequency_list_perm : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), permutation (a :: flat_map (fun p : A * nat => id_list (fst p) (snd p)) l) (flat_map (fun p : A * nat => id_list (fst p) (snd p)) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l))
in_find_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (p : list (A * list bool)) (a : A) (l : list bool) (b : bool), In (a, l) p -> find_code eqA_dec a (map (fun v : A * list bool => let (a1, b1) := v in (a1, b :: b1)) p) = b :: find_code eqA_dec a p
distinct_leaves_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a : btree A, {distinct_leaves a} + {~ distinct_leaves a}
Eqdep_dec.eq_rect_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (p : A) (Q : A -> Type) (x : Q p) (h : p = p), x = eq_rect p Q x p h
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
Eqdep_dec.K_dec_set : forall A : Set, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x : A) (P : x = x -> Prop), P eq_refl -> forall p : x = x, P p
Eqdep_dec.K_dec_type : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x : A) (P : x = x -> Prop), P eq_refl -> forall p : x = x, P p
permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}
number_of_occurrences : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> nat
weight : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> nat
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list (A * nat)
frequency_list_unique : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A), unique_key (frequency_list eqA_dec l)
Eqdep_dec.eq_dep_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (P : A -> Type) (p : A) (x y : P p), EqdepFacts.eq_dep A P p x p y -> x = y
restrict_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> code A
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0
in_alphabet_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (m : list A) (c : code A), {in_alphabet m c} + {~ in_alphabet m c}
in_frequency_map_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l)) -> In a l
in_frequency_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a l -> In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
Eqdep_dec.inj_pair2_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (P : A -> Type) (p : A) (x y : P p), existT P p x = existT P p y -> x = y
